name: The Rise of the Quack
description:
LD46: The Rise of the Quack

Theme: Keep It Alive

Controls: WSAD to move, Space to jump, J to attack

The year is 20XX. Humanity is on the brink of extinction. The City of Neckar is the last bastion remaining to defend against the Legion of Mutants. In the final battle, the evil Quacklord was halted by the psychic Lady Tsunenaga, who was able to enter his mind and recreate his conquest in a virtual simulation, locking him in eternal stasis… at the expense of her corporeal form.

The mutants have risen up and will do whatever it takes to restore Quacklord’s body and defeat Tsunenaga. Only the mighty hero Zo can stop them.

Credits: Obliteration by Kevin MacLeod
